feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for Arizona Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Excessive Heat Warning issued May 07 at 3:17AM MST until May 07 at 8:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions. * WHERE...Western Pima County, Tohono O`odham Nation, Upper Santa Cruz River Valley/Altar Valley, Tucson Metro Area, South Central Pinal County, Southeast Pinal County and Upper San
entry.cap:areaDesc: South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument

entry.title: Excessive Heat Warning issued May 07 at 1:17AM MST until May 07 at 8:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST /8 PM PDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions. Afternoon temperatures 102 to 107. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Arizona and southeast California. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST /8 PM PDT/ this evening.

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued May 06 at 9:09AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH POLLUTION ADVISORY FOR MARICOPA COUNTY INCLUDING THE GREATER PHOENIX AREA THURSDAY... The Arizona Department of Environmental Quality in Phoenix has issued an Ozone High Pollution Advisory for the Greater Phoenix Area for Thursday. This means that forecast weather conditions combined with existing
